item.title: As Nadal plays his last tourney, Federer sends an emotional note from 'your fan, Roger'
item.description: "You challenged me in ways no one else could," Roger Federer tells Rafael Nadal, who will retire after this week's Davis Cup tennis tournament.

item.title: How do you protect a species that lives across a continent? Monarch butterfly decision may soon try
item.description: The monarch butterfly is widely recognized and widely dispersed across North America and it's in trouble. Federal officials decide soon whether it get...

item.title: The U.S. confirms Ukraine fired U.S.-made long-range ATACMS into Russia
item.description: Ukraine has fired six U.S.-made ATACMS into Russia, marking the first attack using the U.S.-made long-range missiles in 1,000 days of war.

item.title: Nationwide IV fluid shortage changing how hospitals manage patient hydration
item.description: Many U.S. hospitals are conserving critical intravenous fluids to cope with a supply shortage caused by Hurricane Helene. They're changing protocols f...

item.title: 1,000 days since Russia invaded Ukraine. And, Trump's proposed plan for your money
